title: Jesus Feeds the Five Thousand and Walks on Water
summary: Jesus is rejected in His hometown. He sends out the disciples to preach and heal. John the Baptist is killed by Herod. Jesus feeds 5,000 people and walks on water, revealing His divine authority and care for others.

faq.question: What is a key message in Mark 6?
faq.answer: It emphasizes the servant nature of Jesus and the power of faith in action.

faq.question: What does Mark 6 reveal about Jesus?
faq.answer: It shows His authority, compassion, and call to follow Him wholeheartedly.
